techmeme.title: Samsung unveils the $300 Galaxy Watch7 and $650 Galaxy Watch Ultra, both with LTE and a 3nm Exynos W1000 chip, 2GB of RAM, and 32GB storage, available July 24 (Victoria Song/The Verge)
Samsung Galaxy Ring hands-on: the $400 ring has a titanium frame, optical heart rate and skin temperature sensors, feels slimmer than the Oura Ring, and more (Victoria Song/The Verge)
Samsung unveils $250 Galaxy Buds 3 Pro and $180 Galaxy Buds 3, with ANC and switching to an AirPods-like stemmed design and case, available on July 24 (Chris Welch/The Verge)
Samsung debuts the Galaxy Z Fold6, with a wider 22.1:9 display, up to 2,600 nits brightness, thinner frame, IP48, and seven years of updates, for $1,899 (Ben Schoon/9to5Google)
Samsung unveils the Galaxy Z Flip6 with 3.4" and 6.7" displays, a 50MP camera sensor, larger 4,000 mAh battery, and Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, for $1,099+ on July 24 (Ben Schoon/9to5Google)
